subtasks: Securely transport pesticides in a truck bed.
Securely transport pesticides in a cargo area.
Securely transport pesticides in another designated area.
Avoid transporting pesticides in the driver or passenger compartment.
Check pesticide containers for leaks before loading.
Check pesticide containers for leaks before unloading.
Protect pesticide containers from damage during transport.
Keep pesticides in a locked area when possible.
